info.title: CdnManagementClient
info.description: Use these APIs to manage Azure CDN resources through the Azure Resource Manager. You must make sure that requests made to these resources are secure.

post.description: Checks the quota and actual usage of endpoints under the given CDN profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium or CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Validates the custom domain mapping to ensure it maps to the correct CDN endpoint in DNS.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium or CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: checkHostNameAvailabilityInput
parameters.description: Custom domain to be validated.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists existing AzureFrontDoor domains.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile or CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an existing AzureFrontDoor domain with the specified domain name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: customDomainName
parameters.description: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new domain within the specified profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: customDomainName
parameters.description: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally

parameters.name: customDomain
parameters.description: Domain properties

201.description: Created. The request has been fulfilled and a new domain has been created.

202.description: Accepted. The request has been accepted for processing and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing domain within a profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: customDomainName
parameters.description: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally

parameters.name: customDomainUpdateProperties
parameters.description: Domain properties

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes an existing AzureFrontDoor domain with the specified domain name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: customDomainName
parameters.description: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally.

204.description: No Content. The request has been accepted but the domain was not found.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: customDomainName
parameters.description: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally.

202.description: Accepted. The request has been accepted for processing and the operation will complete asynchronously. Please poll the targeted custom domain and check the 'validationProperties' field for the new validation token values.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists existing AzureFrontDoor endpoints.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: endpointName

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: Endpoint properties

201.description: Created. The request has been fulfilled and a new endpoint has been created.

202.description: Accepted. The request has been accepted for processing and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing AzureFrontDoor endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile. Only tags can be updated after creating an endpoint. To update origins, use the Update Origin operation. To update origin groups, use the Update Origin group operation. To update domains, use the Update Custom Domain operation.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

parameters.name: endpointUpdateProperties
parameters.description: Endpoint update properties

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed

delete.description: Deletes an existing AzureFrontDoor endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

parameters.name: contents
parameters.description: The list of paths to the content and the list of linked domains to be purged. Path can be a full URL, e.g. '/pictures/city.png' which removes a single file, or a directory with a wildcard, e.g. '/pictures/*' which removes all folders and files in the directory.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

contentPaths.description: The path to the content to be purged. Can describe a file path or a wild card directory.

secretSource.description: Resource reference to the Azure Key Vault certificate. Expected to be in format of /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/{vaultName}/secrets/{certificateName}

useLatestVersion.description: Whether to use the latest version for the certificate

AzureFirstPartyManagedCertificate.description: Azure FirstParty Managed Certificate provided by other first party resource providers to enable HTTPS.

ValidateSecretInput.description: Input of the secret to be validated.

secretSource.description: Resource reference to the Azure Key Vault secret. Expected to be in format of /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/{vaultName}/secrets/{secretName}

secretVersion.description: Secret version, if customer is using a specific version.

AFDDomainListResult.description: Result of the request to list domains. It contains a list of domain objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AzureFrontDoor domains within a profile.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of domain objects if there are any.

AFDDomain.description: Friendly domain name mapping to the endpoint hostname that the customer provides for branding purposes, e.g. www.contoso.com.

AFDDomainProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the domain to create.

domainValidationState.description: Provisioning substate shows the progress of custom HTTPS enabling/disabling process step by step. DCV stands for DomainControlValidation.

hostName.description: The host name of the domain. Must be a domain name.

validationProperties.description: Values the customer needs to validate domain ownership

AFDDomainUpdateParameters.description: The domain JSON object required for domain creation or update.

AFDDomainUpdatePropertiesParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the domain to create.

profileName.description: The name of the profile which holds the domain.

tlsSettings.description: The configuration specifying how to enable HTTPS for the domain - using AzureFrontDoor managed certificate or user's own certificate. If not specified, enabling ssl uses AzureFrontDoor managed certificate by default.

azureDnsZone.description: Resource reference to the Azure DNS zone

preValidatedCustomDomainResourceId.description: Resource reference to the Azure resource where custom domain ownership was prevalidated

DomainValidationProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties to validate a domain.

validationToken.description: Challenge used for DNS TXT record or file based validation

expirationDate.description: The date time that the token expires

AFDDomainHttpsParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties to secure a domain.

certificateType.description: Defines the source of the SSL certificate.

minimumTlsVersion.description: TLS protocol version that will be used for Https

secret.description: Resource reference to the secret. ie. subs/rg/profile/secret

SecurityPolicyProperties.description: The json object that contains properties required to create a security policy

profileName.description: The name of the profile which holds the security policy.

parameters.description: object which contains security policy parameters

SecurityPolicyParameters.description: The json object containing security policy parameters

type.description: The type of the Security policy to create.

SecurityPolicyWebApplicationFirewallPara.description: The json object containing security policy waf parameters

SecurityPolicyWebApplicationFirewallAsso.description: settings for security policy patterns to match

SecurityPolicyListResult.description: Result of the request to list security policies. It contains a list of security policy objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of Security policies within a profile

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of security policy objects if there is any.

AFDEndpoint.description: CDN endpoint is the entity within a CDN profile containing configuration information such as origin, protocol, content caching and delivery behavior. The AzureFrontDoor endpoint uses the URL format <endpointname>.azureedge.net.

AFDEndpointProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties required to create an endpoint.

hostName.description: The host name of the endpoint structured as {endpointName}.{DNSZone}, e.g. contoso.azureedge.net

AFDEndpointListResult.description: Result of the request to list endpoints. It contains a list of endpoint objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AzureFrontDoor endpoints within a profile

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of endpoint objects if there is any.

AFDEndpointUpdateParameters.description: Properties required to create or update an endpoint.

AFDEndpointPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The JSON object containing endpoint update parameters.

profileName.description: The name of the profile which holds the endpoint.

enabledState.description: Whether to enable use of this rule. Permitted values are 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

originResponseTimeoutSeconds.description: Send and receive timeout on forwarding request to the origin. When timeout is reached, the request fails and returns.

contentTypesToCompress.description: List of content types on which compression applies. The value should be a valid MIME type.

isCompressionEnabled.description: Indicates whether content compression is enabled on AzureFrontDoor. Default value is false. If compression is enabled, content will be served as compressed if user requests for a compressed version. Content won't be compressed on AzureFrontDoor when requested content is smaller than 1 byte or larger than 1 MB.

AFDEndpointProtocols.description: Supported protocols for the customer's endpoint.

SecretListResult.description: Result of the request to list secrets. It contains a list of Secret objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AzureFrontDoor secrets within a profile.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of Secret objects if there are any.

Secret.description: Friendly Secret name mapping to the any Secret or secret related information.

SecretProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the Secret to create.

profileName.description: The name of the profile which holds the secret.

parameters.description: object which contains secret parameters

SecretParameters.description: The json object containing secret parameters

SecretType.description: The type of the secret resource.

keyId.description: Defines the customer defined key Id. This id will exist in the incoming request to indicate the key used to form the hash.

secretSource.description: Resource reference to the Azure Key Vault secret. Expected to be in format of /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/{vaultName}/secrets/{secretName}

secretVersion.description: Version of the secret to be used

secretSource.description: Resource reference to the Azure Key Vault certificate. Expected to be in format of /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/{vaultName}/secrets/{certificateName}

secretVersion.description: Version of the secret to be used

useLatestVersion.description: Whether to use the latest version for the certificate

AzureFirstPartyManagedCertificateParamet.description: Azure FirstParty Managed Certificate provided by other first party resource providers to enable HTTPS.

RuleSetListResult.description: Result of the request to list rule sets. It contains a list of rule set objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AzureFrontDoor rule sets within a profile.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of rule set objects if there are any.

RuleSet.description: Friendly RuleSet name mapping to the any RuleSet or secret related information.

RuleSetProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the Rule Set to create.

profileName.description: The name of the profile which holds the rule set.

AFDOrigin.description: CDN origin is the source of the content being delivered via CDN. When the edge nodes represented by an endpoint do not have the requested content cached, they attempt to fetch it from one or more of the configured origins.

AFDOriginProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the origin.

AFDOriginUpdateParameters.description: AFDOrigin properties needed for origin update.

AFDOriginUpdatePropertiesParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the origin.

originGroupName.description: The name of the origin group which contains this origin.

azureOrigin.description: Resource reference to the Azure origin resource.

hostName.description: The address of the origin. Domain names, IPv4 addresses, and IPv6 addresses are supported.This should be unique across all origins in an endpoint.

httpPort.description: The value of the HTTP port. Must be between 1 and 65535.

httpsPort.description: The value of the HTTPS port. Must be between 1 and 65535.

originHostHeader.description: The host header value sent to the origin with each request. If you leave this blank, the request hostname determines this value. Azure CDN origins, such as Web Apps, Blob Storage, and Cloud Services require this host header value to match the origin hostname by default. This overrides the host header defined at Endpoint

priority.description: Priority of origin in given origin group for load balancing. Higher priorities will not be used for load balancing if any lower priority origin is healthy.Must be between 1 and 5

weight.description: Weight of the origin in given origin group for load balancing. Must be between 1 and 1000

sharedPrivateLinkResource.description: The properties of the private link resource for private origin.

enabledState.description: Whether to enable health probes to be made against backends defined under backendPools. Health probes can only be disabled if there is a single enabled backend in single enabled backend pool.

enforceCertificateNameCheck.description: Whether to enable certificate name check at origin level

privateLink.description: The resource id of the resource the shared private link resource is for.

privateLinkLocation.description: The location of the shared private link resource

groupId.description: The group id from the provider of resource the shared private link resource is for.

requestMessage.description: The request message for requesting approval of the shared private link resource.

status.description: Status of the shared private link resource. Can be Pending, Approved, Rejected, Disconnected, or Timeout.

SharedPrivateLinkResourceProperties.description: Describes the properties of an existing Shared Private Link Resource to use when connecting to a private origin.

AFDOriginListResult.description: Result of the request to list origins. It contains a list of origin objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of CDN origins within an endpoint

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of origin objects if there are any.

AFDOriginGroup.description: AFDOrigin group comprising of origins is used for load balancing to origins when the content cannot be served from CDN.

AFDOriginGroupProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the origin group.

AFDOriginGroupUpdateParameters.description: AFDOrigin group properties needed for origin group creation or update.

AFDOriginGroupUpdatePropertiesParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the origin group.

profileName.description: The name of the profile which holds the origin group.

loadBalancingSettings.description: Load balancing settings for a backend pool

healthProbeSettings.description: Health probe settings to the origin that is used to determine the health of the origin.

trafficRestorationTimeToHealedOrNewEndpo.description: Time in minutes to shift the traffic to the endpoint gradually when an unhealthy endpoint comes healthy or a new endpoint is added. Default is 10 mins. This property is currently not supported.

responseBasedAfdOriginErrorDetectionSett.description: The JSON object that contains the properties to determine origin health using real requests/responses. This property is currently not supported.

sessionAffinityState.description: Whether to allow session affinity on this host. Valid options are 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

LoadBalancingSettingsParameters.description: Round-Robin load balancing settings for a backend pool

sampleSize.description: The number of samples to consider for load balancing decisions

successfulSamplesRequired.description: The number of samples within the sample period that must succeed

additionalLatencyInMilliseconds.description: The additional latency in milliseconds for probes to fall into the lowest latency bucket

AFDOriginGroupListResult.description: Result of the request to list origin groups. It contains a list of origin groups objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of CDN origin groups within an endpoint

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of origin objects if there are any.

RouteListResult.description: Result of the request to list routes. It contains a list of route objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AzureFrontDoor routes within a profile.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of route objects if there are any.

Route.description: Friendly Routes name mapping to the any Routes or secret related information.

RouteProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the Routes to create.

RouteUpdateParameters.description: The domain JSON object required for domain creation or update.

RouteUpdatePropertiesParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the domain to create.

endpointName.description: The name of the endpoint which holds the route.

originGroup.description: A reference to the origin group.

originPath.description: A directory path on the origin that AzureFrontDoor can use to retrieve content from, e.g. contoso.cloudapp.net/originpath.

ruleSets.description: rule sets referenced by this endpoint.

supportedProtocols.description: List of supported protocols for this route.

patternsToMatch.description: The route patterns of the rule.

items.description: A route pattern of the rule. Must not have any * except possibly after the final / at the end of the path.

cacheConfiguration.description: The caching configuration for this route. To disable caching, do not provide a cacheConfiguration object.

forwardingProtocol.description: Protocol this rule will use when forwarding traffic to backends.

linkToDefaultDomain.description: whether this route will be linked to the default endpoint domain.

httpsRedirect.description: Whether to automatically redirect HTTP traffic to HTTPS traffic. Note that this is a easy way to set up this rule and it will be the first rule that gets executed.

enabledState.description: Whether to enable use of this rule. Permitted values are 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

AfdRouteCacheConfiguration.description: Caching settings for a caching-type route. To disable caching, do not provide a cacheConfiguration object.

queryStringCachingBehavior.description: Defines how Frontdoor caches requests that include query strings. You can ignore any query strings when caching, ignore specific query strings, cache every request with a unique URL, or cache specific query strings.

queryParameters.description: query parameters to include or exclude (comma separated).

RuleListResult.description: Result of the request to list rules. It contains a list of rule objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AzureFrontDoor rules within a rule set.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of rule objects if there are any.

Rule.description: Friendly Rules name mapping to the any Rules or secret related information.

RuleProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the Rules to create.

RuleUpdateParameters.description: The domain JSON object required for domain creation or update.

RuleUpdatePropertiesParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the rule to update.

ruleSetName.description: The name of the rule set containing the rule.

order.description: The order in which the rules are applied for the endpoint. Possible values {0,1,2,3,}. A rule with a lesser order will be applied before a rule with a greater order. Rule with order 0 is a special rule. It does not require any condition and actions listed in it will always be applied.

conditions.description: A list of conditions that must be matched for the actions to be executed

actions.description: A list of actions that are executed when all the conditions of a rule are satisfied.

matchProcessingBehavior.description: If this rule is a match should the rules engine continue running the remaining rules or stop. If not present, defaults to Continue.

AFDStateProperties.description: The tracking states for afd resources.

AfdErrorResponse.title: Error response
AfdErrorResponse.description: Common error response for all Azure Resource Manager APIs to return error details for failed operations. (This also follows the OData error response format.).

value.description: A string describing the resource name.

localizedValue.description: A localized string describing the resource name.

unit.description: An enum describing the unit of measurement.

currentValue.description: The current value of the usage.

name.description: The name of the type of usage.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results.

isActive.description: Whether the resource is active or inactive

ActivatedResourceReference.description: Reference to another resource along with its state.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2021-06-01.

resourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.
